item.description: 各品类的Top3商品 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 GENERATE ( ALLSELECTED ( 'Product'[Category] ), -- For each category TOPN ( -- retrieve the top 3, -- three product ALLSELECTED ( 'Product'[Product Name] ), -- names based on the [Sales Amount] -- sales amount ) ) 在线尝试 DAX.
